typical_tasks.title: Major renovation phase
typical_tasks.note: High difficulty - Should be broken down into specific tasks (demo, electrical, plumbing, etc.)

difficulty_scale.description: Difficulty based on technical complexity, financial risk, and need for professional help
difficulty_scale.1-2: Simple DIY tasks (paint a room, organize closet, minor shopping)
difficulty_scale.3-4: Moderate DIY tasks (install shelving, minor repairs, basic planning)
difficulty_scale.5-6: Complex DIY or simple contractor work (fence installation, appliance replacement, vendor coordination)
difficulty_scale.7-8: Major contractor work requiring breakdown (kitchen remodel, electrical panel upgrade, extensive planning)
difficulty_scale.9-10: Extensive multi-phase projects (home addition, full renovation, major life transitions)
